cast.name: 克里斯蒂安·梅卡多 Cristian Mercado

writer.name: 豪尔赫·圣希内斯 Jorge Sanjinés

director.name: 豪尔赫·圣希内斯 Jorge Sanjinés

this_title: Juana Azurduy, Guerrillera de la Patria Grande
trans_title: 朱安娜·阿祖杜利，伟大祖国的游击队员
introduction: In November 1825, in the Bolivian city of Chuquisaca, doña Juana Azurduy Bermúdez de Padilla, heroine of the independence war against the Spanish army, receives the visit of the liberators Simón Bolívar, Antonio José de Sucre and José Miguel Lanza. Throughout a long conversation, the woman will receive the admiration of the rulers, while reminiscing the most significant episodes of her career as a patriot and commander of the armed forces
chinese_title: 朱安娜·阿祖杜利，伟大祖国的游击队员
foreign_title: Juana Azurduy, Guerrillera de la Patria Grande
